 I wonder how late that abortion was performed. To me, it looks like maybe week 21 or so, getting towards the limit I would place (just before the brain begins developing around week 25 or so) except in cases where the woman's life is threatened.
 
 Also, I just have to ask, who in their right mind would even allow their abortion to be taped? Emotionally, when we see a mutilated human body, we think that there is a person there suffering.
